name: HEAT RACING (Beta)
description:
The government has made street racing illegal but you need cash to feed your cat, so you enter the race but the police are on to you as the war on racing begins and you are stuck in the middle, cash or cuffs? The choice is yours!

Controls: the arrows keys to move around.

Win the race and escape from law enforcement. 

Bugs identify: some cars will run off the tracks and wont come back.
